reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting China's transition to low carbon energy by enhancing its government's capability to monitor energy statistics

description.narrative: The project is designed to increase knowledge and use – at both national and provincial government level in China - of best practice methodologies, and internationally-agreed concepts and definitions in energy statistics. It is intended that China's energy statistics capability is thereby enhanced, enabling China to monitor energy policy through its transition to low carbon. Doing so will align China's data collection with OECD countries, which will accelerate China's transition to low carbon growth.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
